collectors.titleDetails: (18 total Queries, 18 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: select name from semi_finished where semi_finished_id = '1'

SELECT `bom_operation_list`.`id` as `id`, `bom_operation_list`.`operation_id` as `op_id`, `bom_operation`.`name` as `op_name`, `workstation`.`name` as `w_name`, `bom_operation_list`.`per_hour_cost` as `per_cost`, `bom_operation_list`.`opertaion_time` as `op_time`, `bom_operation_list`.`amount` as `amount` FROM `bom_operation_list` JOIN `bom_operation` ON `bom_operation`.`id` = `bom_operation_list`.`operation_id` JOIN `workstation` ON `workstation`.`id` = `bom_operation`.`default_workstation_id` WHERE `bom_id` = '45'

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: select name from semi_finished where semi_finished_id = '1'

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `bom_operation_list`.`id` as `id`, `bom_operation_list`.`operation_id` as `op_id`, `bom_operation`.`name` as `op_name`, `workstation`.`name` as `w_name`, `bom_operation_list`.`per_hour_cost` as `per_cost`, `bom_operation_list`.`opertaion_time` as `op_time`, `bom_operation_list`.`amount` as `amount` FROM `bom_operation_list` JOIN `bom_operation` ON `bom_operation`.`id` = `bom_operation_list`.`operation_id` JOIN `workstation` ON `workstation`.`id` = `bom_operation`.`default_workstation_id` WHERE `bom_id` = '45'
